product_name: Nitecore CB6 Multicolor LED Flashlight - White/Blue - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and 35-lumen blue LED, this pocket-size flashlight tackles campsites, night hikes and sport tracking with the simple press of a button.
short_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and 35-lumen blue LED, this pocket-size flashlight tackles campsites, night hikes and sport tracking with the simple press of a button.
